top_comments.comment: Really fortunate enough to listen and feel this knowledge by Gurudev 🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻❤️

comments_since_last_sample.body: What a powerful talk . A total summary of all spirituality , humanity and beyond . To be actually heard everyday as mediation . With such clarity concept of time , zero and god he answers and with such playfulness .Guruji this was synchronicity!!! 💝💜🌈🕉☮️🎵♾
What a bunch of bullshit! Passing bullshit as divine knowledge and science!
